metadata.title: CVE-2015-5667 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the HTML-Scrubber module before0.15 for Perl, when the comment feature is enabled, allows remote attackersto inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted comment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5667` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhtml-scrubber-perl - 0.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libhtml-scrubber-perl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.15-1').
